); } // About Section if (currentView === 'about') { return (

About the Vaccination Registry System

üè• How the System Works

  1. Hospital Registration: Healthcare providers register with their license information
  2. Admin Authorization: System administrators verify and authorize hospitals
  3. Child Birth Registration: Authorized hospitals register newborns and create NFT records
  4. NFT Distribution: Vaccination NFTs are automatically sent to parent wallets
  5. Vaccination Recording: Hospitals record vaccinations with automatic QR code generation
  6. Parent Management: Parents can view and manage their children's records

üîí Security Features

  • Blockchain Immutability: Records cannot be altered once confirmed
  • Role-Based Access: Only authorized hospitals can create and update records
  • NFT Ownership: Parents own their children's vaccination NFTs
  • QR Verification: Instant verification without revealing personal data
  • Decentralized Storage: IPFS integration for additional medical documents

üë• User Roles

üëë System Admin

Authorize hospitals and manage system settings

üè• Hospital

Register children and record vaccinations

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Parent

View and manage children's vaccination records

üì± Technology Stack

  • Blockchain: Ethereum with ERC-721 NFT standard
  • Smart Contracts: Solidity with OpenZeppelin libraries
  • Frontend: React.js with Web3 integration
  • Storage: IPFS for decentralized file storage
  • Wallet: MetaMask for blockchain interaction
); } return null; } export default App;
